# Dry season

## Load result

```{r}
load("../rda/dry_spab_50_model_inter_full_WD_all.rda")
fit_dry <- fit
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
print(fit, pars = c("gamma", "Omega", "lp__"))
```

## Coefplot for Dry seasons

```{r}

post <- as.data.frame(fit_dry)

gammas <- str_c("gamma[",rep(1:12, each = 11), ",", 1:11,"]")
post_gamma <- post[, gammas]

par_name <- expand.grid(colnames(Ud), colnames(Xd)) |>
  as_tibble() |>
  mutate(gammas) |>
  mutate(par_name = paste(Var1, "on", Var2))

colnames(post_gamma) <- par_name$par_name

upper <- apply(post_gamma, 2, function(x)quantile(x, 0.975))
lower <-  apply(post_gamma, 2, function(x)quantile(x, 0.025))

tmp <- upper * lower
tmp2 <- tmp[tmp > 0]
names(tmp2)

post_gamma2 <- post_gamma |>
  dplyr::select(names(tmp2))

mcmc_intervals(
  post_gamma2,
 # pars = gammas,
  prob = 0,
  prob_outer = 0.95,
  point_est = "median"
) +
  xlab("Effects on seedling survival") +
  theme(
    axis.text = element_text(family = "sans"),
    axis.title = element_text(family = "sans"))
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
beta3 <- str_c("beta[", 1:n_sp_d, ",3]")
beta3 <- as.tibble(post[, beta3]) 
colnames(beta3) <- str_c("sp", 1:n_sp_d)

beta3_dat <- beta3 %>%
  gather(., "sp", "post")

beta3_dat2 <- beta3_dat %>%
  group_by(sp) %>%
  summarize(
    med = median(post),
    upr = quantile(post, 0.975),
    low = quantile(post, 0.0275)
  ) %>%
  ungroup()

WP_dat <- tibble(
  sp = str_c("sp", 1:n_sp_d),
  WP = list_dat_d$u[,2])

beta3_dat3 <- full_join(beta3_dat2, WP_dat, by = "sp")

ggplot(beta3_dat3, aes(x = WP)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = med)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = upr), col = "red") +
  geom_point(aes(y = low), col = "red")
```
